author: Josh Hanrahan
title: Sahara Ray flaunts her body with porn star Jessie Andrews | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 166 shares Opting for a black pair of bikini bottoms that rose high on her waist, the stunning blonde flaunted her toned legs and abs. Wearing a tight, white bather top, her assets were well and truly on display. Not just a pretty face: Days earlier the Australian star stripped down to show off her fantastic physique in a skimpy bikini that was one of her own designs Behind and in front of her, Ray's two gal pals also showed off their toned physiques. Days earlier Sahara again flaunted her flawless figure in one of her own skimpy bikini designs. In a coal-coloured top that barely covered her ample assets, she almost busted out of the bikini. The nude coloured bottoms stood out against the star's bronzed skin, as she gave a seductive pout to the camera. Back in paradise: Sahara posed a second sultry snap that appeared to show her back in Bali after a trip to Aspen, Colorado Feeling nippy? On Wednesday, Sahara shared a snap from the ski fields of Aspen, that quickly become one of her most popular posts It was the first of two racy images the model uploaded on Thursday. Hours later, Sahara, who is the daughter of famous surfer Tony Ray, posed by a pool as she carried a bowl of frangipani flowers. Tilting her head back, with her eyes closed, the designer looked at home in the exotic surrounds. The waterside photos follow a revealing selfie she took in a see-through top just days earlier in snowy Aspen, Colorado. Infamous skinny dip: Sahara hit headlines after she was caught on camera enjoying a swim with Justin Bieber on a Hawaiian holiday last August Rising star: Sahara is a model and bikini designer who runs her own brand 'Sahara Ray Swim' Nippy: Despite temperatures dropping to just two degrees celsius, Sahara clearly didn't feel the need to cover up Despite temperatures dropping to a nippy high of just two degrees celsius, Sahara clearly didn't feel the need to cover up as she posed in the snow. The swimwear designer opted to go braless in a see-through lace top, that revealed her pierced nipples. The model was linked to pop superstar Justin when they were caught on camera shedding their clothes at a Hawaiian lagoon mid-last year. It is unclear if they were dating during the 'holiday romance' and Sahara has not yet spoken publicly about the incident. Secretive: Sahara has not yet spoken publicly about the incident with popstar Justin Beiber Share or comment on this article 166
